function onInit() if super and super.onInit then super.onInit() end setFrameTypes(); end
function onValueChanged() if super and super.onValueChanged then super.onValueChanged() end setFrameTypes(); end
function setFrameTypes() local value = getValue(); if value == 0 then setFrame("fielddark", 10, 8, 10, 6); elseif value == 1 then setFrame("fieldfocus", 10, 8, 10, 6); end end
